alert.note: Alert for Austin; Grimes; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Waller; Washington (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 7:46PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Austin, southeastern Grimes, southeastern Washington, west central Montgomery, northern Waller and northwestern Harris Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 746 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Prairie View, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hempstead, Prairie View, Pinehurst, Waller, Magnolia, Pine Island, Todd Mission, Plantersville and Dobbin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Austin; Grimes; Inland Harris; Montgomery; Waller; Washington
